channel.title: Math Help [Fast Please]
channel.description:
Fifty students were asked their favorite movie twenty said the currnet number 1 movie, 25 said the current number 2 movie, and the rest said other.
Current Number 1: Current Number 2: Other: ____________________________________________________________________________________________ The Perimeter of a triangle is 30cm one side is 7cm longer than the shortest side the longest side is 3cm more then twice the lingth of the shortest side find the length of the shortest side find the length of each side of the triangle? ____________________________________________________________________________________________ Find Coords of D(3,2) and K(1,-1) A translation of 4 units left and 2 units up: A reflection over the Y Axis: A rotation of 90 deg about the orgin: ____________________________________________________________________________________________ Find X 5x + 40= 9x - 24

item.title: Math Help [Fast Please]
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

You seem to feel that you made your life a lot easier, then by getting us to do your test questions for you. But, in fact, if you can’t spend the two minutes it takes to these questions yourself, then its really your loss in the long run imho.

Read full topic

item.title: Math Help [Fast Please]
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Bob answered them

but for number 4 bob,

i get:

5x + 40 = 9x - 24
40 = 4x - 24
4x = 64
x = 16

Read full topic

item.title: Math Help [Fast Please]
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

  1. What are you even asking? Do you want percentages?

Current Number 1: 40%
Current Number 2: 50%
Other: 10%

P = 30
a = 7 + b
c = 3 + 2b

(7 + b) + b + (3 + 2b) = 30
10 + 4b = 30
4b = 20
b = 5

And this turns out fine…side a would be 12 and side b would be 13: a 5-12-13 right triangle.

Translation: D1(-1, 4) and K1(-3, 1)
Reflection: D2(-3, 2) and K2(-1, -1)

I’m guessing you mean flipped about the origin?
Rotation: D3(-3, -2) and K3(-1, 1)

Listen to the others

Read full topic

item.title: Math Help [Fast Please]
item.dc:creator: @TestDummy TestDummy
item.description:
@TestDummy wrote:

[quote=“zammyking111, post:1, topic:77981”]Find X
5x + 40= 9x - 24[/quote]

If I’m not mistaken, x is 16.

[code][5x + 40 = 9x - 24]
-5x -5x

[40 = 4x - 24]
+24 + 24

64 = 4x

4 4

[16 = x]
[/code]

Read full topic
